english.segment1: We're the ones, and you're looking up at us, saying be the ones, be the ones. You're the ones, and we're looking up to you, saying you're the ones
english.segment2: We're the ones, and you're keeping us alive, saying be the ones, be the ones. You're the ones, who are holding the front line, you're the ones
english.segment3: Welcome every one. Who came out to the show. Show me that you're ready, you're ready to go. Welcome every one
english.segment4: Welcome every one. Who came out to the show. We're wound up and we're ready, we're ready to go
